segments.text: Wow, the water is really overflowing from the sink, and no one has noticed yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate, completely unaware of the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are so focused on the cookies that they don't see the water either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really surprised by how unaware everyone is in this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, which looks so unstable and about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising that no one is paying attention to what's happening around them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, not caring about the water or the unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised that the woman hasn't turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is becoming such a mess, and it's surprising to see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really surprised by how much of a mess this kitchen is becoming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just full of surprises.
segments.speaker: PAR
